blogsnip 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    blogsnip

    What

    {blogsnip} is a package of RStudio addins for inserting code snippets into {blogdown} posts.

    These snippets make my life easier when writing R Markdown blog posts for rostrum.blog. You may or may not find them useful. The package will be updated over time with new addins as I see fit.

    You can read about each addin on the ‘references’ page of the {blogsnip} website or browse the source.

    Install

    Install with:

    install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("matt-dray/blogsnip")

    The addins will then be available from the ‘Addins’ menu in RStudio, listed under ‘BLOGSNIP’.

    Contribute

    Feel free to add or suggest new snippets.

    Please note that the ‘blogsnip’ project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
